View on GitHub

KGQA-leaderboard

Repository to track the progress in Question Answering over Knowledge Graphs (KGQA), including the datasets and the current state-of-the-art for the most common KGQA tasks.

Large-scale Complex Question Answering

LC-QuAD v1.0 and v2.0 are large-scale QA datasets towards complex questions against knowledge graphs.

Table of contents

  • LC-QuAD 1.0
  • LC-QuAD 2.0

LC-QuAD v1

The Largescale Complex Question Answering Dataset 1.0 (LC-QuAD 1.0) is a Question Answering dataset with 5000 pairs of question and its corresponding SPARQL query. The target knowledge base is DBpedia, specifically, the April, 2016 version. Please see our [paper for details about the dataset creation process and framework.

Leaderboard

Model / System Year Precision Recall F1 Lang Reported by
STaG-QA 2021 76.5 52.8 51.4 EN Ravishankar et al.
STaG-QA_pre 2021 74.5 54.8 53.6 EN Ravishankar et al.

LC-QuAD v2

The Largescale Complex Question Answering Dataset 2.0 (LC-QuAD 2.0) is a Large Question Answering dataset with 30,000 pairs of question and its corresponding SPARQL query. The target knowledge base is Wikidata and DBpedia, specifically the 2018 version. Please see our paper for details about the dataset creation process and framework.

Leaderboard

Model / System Year Precision Recall F1 Lang Reported by
NSQA 2021 38.19 40.39 38.29 EN Kapanipathi et al.
QAmp 2021 25 50 33 EN Kapanipathi et al.
